title: Jandy JXi Heater (Rev G & Rev H) — Guided Troubleshooting

enter_serial.text:
Enter the full serial number from the JXi heater.

- Rev G or earlier: starts with B and is 9 characters long (2017 & earlier)
- Rev H or newer: starts with LB and is 18 characters long (2018+)

invalid_serial.text:
❌ Invalid serial number. Try again.
Expected formats:
- Rev G or earlier = B#####
- Rev H or newer = LB#####

rev_g_start.text: Which input voltage is the JXi Rev G configured for?

rev_g_120.text: Measure power at Distribution Board (Black C → Red B). Expect 110–126 VAC.

rev_g_240.text: Measure power at Distribution Board (Black C → Red B). Expect 220–252 VAC.

rev_g_step2.text: Measure transformer output (Red 2 → Yellow 1). Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_g_step2_check_input.text:
Measured transformer output below 22 VAC.

Verify incoming voltage (110–126 or 220–252 VAC). If input correct and output low → replace transformer.

rev_g_step4.text: Check Water Pressure Switch: 24 VAC Purple (4) and Ground. Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_g_step5.text: Check Fusible Link chain: Check from Orange (6) to Ground  22–26 VAC?

rev_g_igniter.text: After blower starts, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

rev_g_igniter_check_input.text:
Measure voltage at Ignition Control K & I terminals during ignition. Expect 105–130 VAC.

If no voltage → verify 24 VAC to board.
If voltage present → check ignitor continuity.

rev_g_igniter_check_continuity.text:
With power off and ignitor cool, check continuity between ignitor leads.

✅ Continuity present → ignitor intact.
❌ Open circuit → replace ignitor.
(Optional) Cold resistance ≈ 40–75 Ω; > 90 Ω = weak element.

rev_g_igniter_no_power.text: No 120 VAC to ignitor. Verify ignition control receives 24 VAC and ground. If 24 VAC present but no output, replace ignition control.

replace_ignitor.text: Replace Hot Surface Ignitor. Verify connections and ceramic integrity before restart.

rev_g_gas.text: Check for approx. 24 VAC at Brown (gas valve) → Yellow (Ground). Is voltage Present?

rev_g_flame.text: Do burners ignite and stay lit > 7 s?

rev_h_start.text: Which input voltage is the JXi Rev H configured for?

rev_h_120.text: Measure power at Distribution Board (Black C → Red B). Expect 110–126 VAC.

rev_h_240.text: Measure at Distribution Board from Black C to  Red B`  . Expect 220–252 VAC.

rev_h_step2.text: Measure transformer output (Between Red 2 and Yellow Ground 1). Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_h_step2_check_input.text:
Measured transformer output below 22 VAC.

Verify incoming voltage (110–126 / 220–252 VAC). If input correct and output low → replace transformer.

rev_h_step4.text: Water Pressure Switch: Check for 24 VAC between Purple (4) and Yellow (Ground). Check for 24 VAC between Gray (5) and Yellow (Ground) Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_h_pressure_switch_failed.text: Voltage is 0 or below spec — Verify filer pump is on, filter is clean, and filter pressure is above 2 psi. If Filter pressure is above 2 psi and the pressure switch is still open, repalce pressure switch (P/N R0457001)

rev_h_step5.text: High Limits: Check for 24 VAC from each leg of high limits to ground. What was the voltage between each leg and ground?

rev_h_highlimit_failed.text: Below expected Voltage — one or more high limit switches are open. Replace both high limits (P/N R0592300), then continue diagnostics.

rev_h_igniter.text: After blower starts, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

rev_h_igniter_check_input.text:
Measure voltage at Ignition Control K & I terminals during ignition. Expect 105–130 VAC.

If no voltage → verify 24 VAC supply.
If voltage present → check ignitor continuity.

rev_h_igniter_check_continuity.text:
With power off and ignitor cool, check continuity between ignitor leads.

✅ Continuity present → ignitor intact.
❌ Open circuit → replace ignitor.

rev_h_igniter_no_power.text: No 120 VAC to ignitor. Verify ignition control receives 24 VAC and ground. If 24 VAC present but no output, replace ignition control.

rev_h_gas.text: Check for approx. 24 VAC at Brown (gas valve) → Yellow (Ground). Is voltage Present?

rev_h_flame.text: Do burners ignite and stay lit > 7 s?

fix_power.text: Correct incoming power / breaker / wiring to heater before continuing.
